reviews.review_msg: Kirsten, or Dr.Uszkalo (as she specifically demands to be referred to), is a very controversial prof.  If you're a strong feminist woman, there is no doubt you will be a fave in her class.  She knows her stuff (as do all profs).  Just beware of how subjective and single tracked her mind is: no challenge is welcomed.

I really enjoyed his class.  he is extremely well-spoken and is very open to having students drop by to discuss anything from the class, to paper topics, etc.  He is also very generous by offering a free revision of papers (if you can get them in by the deadline).  Overall, a really great instructor!

The problem with the faculty is that there are a million kids who want a degree so they can be Elementary teachers. If you're one of those people, don't take this class, as Fleming is passionate about examining LITERATURE (Milton, in this case), and you will be smoked if you bring your ditzy 'I'm participating by repeating what he just said' junk.
Professor Fleming encourages intelligent discussion. He is interested, and knows his subject material well. If anybody knows Milton, it's this guy.
